location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 18: Lieuetenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Hennell forwards copies of his letters to Lieutenant-Colonel [Justin] Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister at the Government of Tehran. The numbers and dates of the letters are given in the margin. The letters are not included here, but nos. 5, 6, and 14 do appear earlier in the file (see ff.2-4, f.5 and f.6 respectively).
